tool_description: Get essential (24 data points) domain information realtime with one simple call.
title: Livescan a Domain

api_list.name: Domain Information
api_list.description: Get data points of a given domain : A record, MX record, TXT/SPF record, SOA record, CMS Type (Generator), Certificate Issuer, Certificate Subject, Certificate Start Date, Certificate End Date, Domain creation date, Domain name (or partial), Domain expire date, Domain updated date, Javascript Libraries, Hostname (or partial), HTML Header Tags,  IP Address, Page title from domain homepage, Page meta tags (including og), Organization, Registrar, TLD, Server software (Apache, PHP, nginx etc), Server geolocation
